filters.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or clear all filters

mockData.challenges: The client faced multiple challenges including poor performance of legacy systems, suboptimal user experience, and difficulties with mobile adaptation. The existing platform could not meet the rapidly growing business needs and required comprehensive upgrades.
mockData.solution: We rebuilt the entire platform using modern technology stack, implemented responsive design to ensure consistent cross-device experience, optimized database queries to improve performance, and introduced automated testing to ensure code quality. Through agile development methodology, we completed the comprehensive platform upgrade within 3 months.
